data.lyric:
[ti:Come And Get Your Love (《银河护卫队》电影插曲)]
[ar:Redbone]
[al:Guardians of the Galaxy: Awesome Mix Vol. 1 (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Come And Get Your Love - Redbone
[00:03.53]Lyrics by：Lolly Vegas/Pat Vegas
[00:07.07]Composed by：Lolly Vegas
[00:10.61]Hail
[00:11.61]Hail
[00:13.13]What's the matter with your head yeah
[00:19.72]Hail
[00:20.60]Hail
[00:22.10]What's the matter with your mind
[00:24.51]And your sign an-a oh-oh-oh
[00:28.57]Hail
[00:29.47]Hail
[00:31.05]Nothin' the matter with your head
[00:33.38]Baby find it come on and find it
[00:37.56]Hail with it baby 'cause you're fine
[00:42.39]And you're mine and you look so divine
[00:46.86]Come and get your love
[00:51.43]Come and get your love
[00:55.78]Come and get your love
[01:00.21]Come and get your love
[01:06.61]Hail
[01:07.60]Hail
[01:09.13]What's the matter with you feel right
[01:13.05]Don't you feel right baby
[01:15.44]Hail oh yeah get it from the main vine all right
[01:23.79]I said-a find it find it
[01:27.04]Go on and love it if you like it yeah
[01:33.49]Hail
[01:34.41]Hail
[01:35.93]It's your business if you want some take some
[01:40.43]Get it together baby
[01:43.06]Come and get your love
[01:47.45]Come and get your love
[01:51.60]Come and get your love
[01:55.96]Come and get your love

[02:15.55]Come and get your love

[02:39.94]Hail
[02:41.00]Hail
[02:42.55]What's the matter with you feel right
[02:46.22]Don't you feel right baby
[02:48.69]Hail oh yeah get it from the main vine all right
[03:04.23]La la la la la la la la la la
[03:07.81]Come and get your love
[03:08.88]La la la la la la la la la woohoo
[03:11.61]Come and get your love
[03:13.29]La la la la la la la la la la
[03:15.78]Come and get your love
[03:17.42]La na na na na na da boom
[03:19.94]Come and get your love
[03:21.89]La da boom boom boom ta daba boom boom
data.trans:
[ti:勇敢地来争取你的爱吧 (《银河护卫队》电影插曲)]
[ar:Redbone]
[al:Guardians of the Galaxy: Awesome Mix Vol. 1 (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:03.53]//
[00:07.07]//
[00:10.61]嘿
[00:11.61]嘿
[00:13.13]你的脑袋瓜究竟怎么了？
[00:19.72]嘿
[00:20.60]嘿
[00:22.10]你的脑袋瓜究竟在想些什么
[00:24.51]为何叹息
[00:28.57]嘿
[00:29.47]嘿
[00:31.05]没什么大不了的
[00:33.38]去寻找你的爱吧 去吧寻觅你的爱吧
[00:37.56]宝贝 如此出色的你
[00:42.39]非我莫属了 你看起来棒极了
[00:46.86]勇敢地来争取你的爱吧
[00:51.43]勇敢地来争取你的爱吧
[00:55.78]勇敢地来争取你的爱吧
[01:00.21]勇敢地来争取你的爱吧
[01:06.61]嘿
[01:07.60]嘿
[01:09.13]你究竟是怎么了？
[01:13.05]感觉很糟么 宝贝
[01:15.44]从藤蔓上摘下爱的果实
[01:23.79]我说去寻觅吧 寻觅你的爱吧
[01:27.04]如果你喜欢 就勇敢去爱吧
[01:33.49]嘿
[01:34.41]嘿
[01:35.93]如果你想体会爱的甜蜜就要去争取
[01:40.43]大胆去体会 全身心将之拥有吧
[01:43.06]勇敢地来争取你的爱吧
